title: Denali National Park & Preserve: Art Galleries
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Artist-in-Residence Program     Art Galleries              Art Galleries         Alaska Public Lands Information Center in Fairbanks   Arguably the best traveling art show in Alaska, there are five National Park Service locations where artwork is displayed from the Artist-in-Residence program collection. Gallery displays tend to rotate twice a year, each spring and fall.        Alaska Public Lands Information Centers, Fairbanks Morris Thompson Cultural & Visitors Center 101 Dunkel Street Suite 110 Fairbanks, AK 99701 907 459.3730  Summer Hours: 8 am - 6 pm, seven days a week Winter Hours: 8 am -5 pm, Monday-Saturday    Murie Science and Learning Center Mile 1.4 of the Denali Park Road Dates: Year-round Hours: 9 am to 4:30 pm daily, except major holidays    Walter Harper Talkeetna Ranger Station Talkeetna, AK 99676, 907 733-2231  Dates: Year-round      Denali Visitor Center Dates: Seasonally (May 15 - mid-September) Hours: 8 am - 6 pm, in season Mile 1.5 of the Denali Park Road     Eielson Visitor Center Dates: Seasonally (June 1 - mid-September) Hours: 9 am - 7 pm Reachable only by shuttle bus in season                      Artists Experience the Park   63 Photos  .
